title: MD
biography: Gautham Vasudev Menon is an Indian film director, screenwriter, film producer and actor who predominantly works in Tamil film industry. He has also directed Telugu, Hindi and Malayalam films that were mostly either simultaneously shot with or remakes of his own Tamil films. He also has acted in some Malayalam and Telugu films. He has won two National Film Awards, three Nandi Awards and one Tamil Nadu State Film Award.
aiSummary: Gautam Menon is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 43 at Epidemic modeling (Member). Has been published in The Lancet Digital Health, The Lancet, Nature Communications. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
